pkgmetadata.longdescription: Test for Finiteness of Moments in a Distribution // The purpose of this package is to tests whether a given moment of the distribution of a given sample is finite or not. For heavy- tailed distributions with tail exponent b, only moments of order smaller than b are finite. Tail exponent and heavy- tailedness are notoriously difficult to ascertain. But the finiteness of moments (including fractional moments) can be tested directly. This package does that following the test suggested by Trapani (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2015.08.006.
